text: Sadıkbey is a station on the Konak Tram line in İzmir, Turkey. Originally named Küçükyalı, it is located along the Mustafa Kemal Coastal Boulevard in west Konak. The station consists of two side platforms, one on each side of the boulevard. Sadıkbey station opened on 24 March 2018. ==Connections== ESHOT operates city bus service on Mustafa Kemal Coastal Boulevard. {| class="toccolours" border="1" cellpadding="3" style="border-collapse:collapse" |+ ESHOT Bus service |- style="background:lightblue;" !Route Number !Stop !Route !Location |- |12 |Sadık Bey |F.
